title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: 

 More and more people join Rush, talking about reopening the economy. Last week wasn't as bad as predicted. Drive-By Media, Dems push bogus narrative Trump was unprepared, ignored warnings. New evidence everybody knew the Steele Dossier was bogus. Economic shutdown is political effort to get rid of Trump. Liberals love this shutdown, proving government can feed people, keep them safe and save the planet. NYT story says Trump ignored warnings. Fauci said in January and February that Americans had nothing to fear from coronavirus. No quarrel with Fauci's qualifications as a doctor, but there are things he needs to explain. How does Fauci get away with it? Fauci now says his recommendation to shut down sooner was ignored, can't guarantee safety of November election. Sound bites from Fauci from January and February saying coronavirus was nothing to worry about. Trump is a bigger target than the virus for the left. 

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2: 

Trump to name task force to reopen the economy. Democrats love this shutdown because it puts the government in charge of everything. Ideas for reopening the country. Fauci suggests Orwellian immunity cards. Modeler who was wrong warns of coronavirus spike if we reopen in May. Vegas police officer on impact of the economic shutdown. Bill Bennett on reaction to coronavirus, flu comparison. We saw nothing like this during the 2009-2010 swine flu. Obesity, diabetes seem like most common preexisting conditions associated with coronavirus hospitalizations. 

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Hogan Gidley: Trump's not firing Fauci, despite retweeting tweet with #FireFauci hashtag. Modeler Chris Murray, who's never been right, predicts coronavirus rebound if we reopen. Sarah Hoyt on modeling and culture. Physician's assistant laid off because elective procedures are cancelled. Trump names task force to open economy, tells governors it's his decision, not theirs, says it's the toughest decision he has to make. It doesn't need to be so complicated to reopen the economy. Herd immunity. Biden-Trump polls are meaningless right now.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
